pages.text: Table which allows infusing objects with magic at the cost of XP.$(br)Used to create $(l:myth_and_magic:spells)spells$().$(br)Can also be used to $(l:myth_and_magic:infusion/upgrading_enchantments)upgrade enchantments$().$(br)Needs to be powered by 20 candles.$(br2)$(o)This is a good place to start.$()
